page.description: When you duplicate a set, you create a new set definition that has the same structure, and contains the same field rules, layouts, operations, etc. that were associated with the original set.

section.note: The tables that the set references are not duplicated.

section.description: To duplicate a set with the Duplicate Set dialog box:

step.description: Right click on a set in the Control Panel, and select Utilities > Duplicate.
Enter the new set name either by:

case.description: 1. Typing it into the New Set Name field
2. Clicking Browse and selecting a set to replace from the New Set Name dialog box.

step.description: Click OK to conclude or Cancel to discard your inputs.
